leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 环境-污染/生态建模与监测生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 采集→清洗→预测/告警→解释→报告
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 时序库 + 监控 + 可视化

queries: [WEB] air quality forecasting evaluation metrics github
[WEB] climate change machine learning datasets github

tools.name: Terra
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal spatio-temporal dataset and benchmark spanning the Earth
tools.detailed_description: Terra is a multimodal spatio-temporal dataset and benchmark designed for Earth system modeling. It integrates various data sources to support research in environmental monitoring and climate science.

tools.name: Oil-Spill-Detection-SAR
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning workflow for oil spill detection using synthetic SAR data
tools.detailed_description: A project demonstrating oil spill detection in synthetic SAR imagery. It includes tools for generating synthetic datasets with speckle noise and spill regions, and a U-Net model for segmentation.

tools.name: Satellite-Image-Captioning-Model
tools.one_line_profile: Synthetic satellite imagery captioning workflow
tools.detailed_description: Generates captions for synthetic satellite imagery using machine learning. It provides a benchmark-ready dataset and modeling workflow for testing satellite image captioning.

tools.name: Wetland-Classification-GEE-CNN
tools.one_line_profile: Wetland classification workflow using synthetic spectral features
tools.detailed_description: Employs synthetic spectral and index features to classify land into water, wetland, and upland. Demonstrates a workflow combining remote sensing concepts with deep learning.

tools.name: aq-biascorrection
tools.one_line_profile: Bias correction tool for CAMS air quality model predictions
tools.detailed_description: A tool for bias correction of air quality CAMS model predictions by using OpenAQ observations. Developed by ECMWF Code for Earth.

tools.name: BiodiversityTools
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial biodiversity modelling tools suite
tools.detailed_description: A suite of spatial biodiversity modelling tools including software and code developed and maintained by NSW DCCEEW's Metrics and Forecasting Ecological Modelling Team.

tools.name: eo4ai
tools.one_line_profile: Earth Observation dataset preprocessing tools for Deep Learning
tools.detailed_description: A set of tools for preprocessing Earth Observation datasets to make them suitable for Deep Learning applications, developed by ESA Phi-Lab.

tools.name: Dataset4EO
tools.one_line_profile: Platform and library for Earth Observation datasets
tools.detailed_description: Official repository for the EarthNets Platform, providing access and tools for various Earth Observation datasets.

tools.name: RSI-Classification
tools.one_line_profile: Remote Sensing Image Classification tools
tools.detailed_description: Tools and models for Image/Scene Classification in Remote Sensing Images, part of the EarthNets Platform.

tools.name: RSI-Detection
tools.one_line_profile: Remote Sensing Object Detection tools
tools.detailed_description: Tools and models for Object Detection in Remote Sensing Images, part of the EarthNets Platform.

tools.name: RSI-Segmentation
tools.one_line_profile: Remote Sensing Semantic Segmentation tools
tools.detailed_description: Tools and models for Semantic Segmentation in Remote Sensing Images, part of the EarthNets Platform.

tools.name: TFNet-ESC
tools.one_line_profile: Time-Frequency Network for Environmental Sound Classification
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning method (TFNet) for environmental sound classification that uses temporal and frequency attention mechanisms to enhance features from audio signals.

tools.name: SustainDC
tools.one_line_profile: Data Center simulation and control environment
tools.detailed_description: A set of Python environments for Data Center simulation and control using Heterogeneous Multi Agent Reinforcement Learning, focusing on sustainability and energy optimization.

tools.name: SustainCluster
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark environment for sustainable workload scheduling
tools.detailed_description: A high-fidelity Gymnasium environment for benchmarking multi-objective, sustainable workload scheduling across geo-distributed data centers, integrating energy, carbon, and weather data.

tools.name: Sustain-LC
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking environment for data center controls
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking environment for traditional, reinforcement learning, and LLM-based controls in data centers, focusing on sustainability.

tools.name: IUCNN
tools.one_line_profile: Neural networks for predicting species conservation status
tools.detailed_description: A tool to train neural networks based on geographic species occurrences, environmental data, and IUCN Red List assessments to predict the conservation status of species.

tools.name: WBLCA Benchmark V2 Data
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset for Whole Building Life Cycle Assessment (WBLCA) benchmarking
tools.detailed_description: A public repository containing data collected and prepared for the CLF WBLCA Benchmark Study V2. It includes building design characteristics, life cycle inventories, and environmental impact assessment results for 292 building projects in North America.

tools.name: gval
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for evaluating geospatial dataset skill against benchmark maps
tools.detailed_description: A high-level Python framework developed by NOAA-OWP to evaluate the skill of geospatial datasets. It compares candidate datasets to benchmark maps to produce agreement maps and metrics, facilitating rigorous validation of geospatial models.

tools.name: PredBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for spatio-temporal prediction across diverse disciplines
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmark for evaluating spatio-temporal prediction models across various scientific disciplines, including weather forecasting and environmental monitoring. It provides standardized datasets and metrics for comparing model performance.

tools.name: ClimART
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark dataset for ML emulation of atmospheric radiative transfer
tools.detailed_description: A large-scale dataset designed for benchmarking machine learning models that emulate atmospheric radiative transfer in weather and climate models. It enables the development of faster and more accurate climate simulations.

tools.name: GeoBenchX
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for LLM agents on multi-step geospatial tasks
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite designed to evaluate Large Language Model (LLM) agents on complex, multi-step geospatial tasks. It includes an LLM-as-Judge evaluation framework to assess tool usage and reasoning in geospatial contexts.

tools.name: Weather Data Analytics Framework
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for frequency-based analysis of extreme climate events
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based framework for modeling and benchmarking occurrences of extreme climate events, such as extreme temperature and precipitation. It employs empirical cumulative distribution functions (ECDF) for learning and prediction phases.

tools.name: GEO-Bench-VLM
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for Vision-Language Models on geospatial tasks
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark specifically designed to evaluate the performance of Vision-Language Models (VLMs) on various geospatial tasks, facilitating the development of multi-modal AI for earth sciences.

tools.name: SDGi Corpus Benchmarks
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarks for text classification by Sustainable Development Goals
tools.detailed_description: A multilingual dataset and benchmark suite for classifying text according to the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs). Developed by UNDP, it supports policy science and environmental text analysis.

tools.name: CY-Bench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for subnational crop yield forecasting
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive dataset and benchmark for forecasting crop yields at the subnational level. It standardizes the selection, processing, and spatio-temporal harmonization of public yield statistics with relevant predictors for agricultural modeling.

tools.name: mbDenoise
tools.one_line_profile: Microbiome data denoising using zero-inflated probabilistic PCA
tools.detailed_description: An accurate and robust method for denoising microbiome count matrices. It uses a zero-inflated probabilistic PCA (ZIPPCA) model to handle zero-inflation, unequal sequencing depth, and overdispersion in microbiome data, recovering true abundance levels.

tools.name: TetWild
tools.one_line_profile: Robust tetrahedral meshing for simulation
tools.detailed_description: A robust tool for generating tetrahedral meshes from arbitrary triangle soups. While general-purpose, it is a critical solver for scientific simulations (finite element analysis) in physics and engineering contexts.

tools.name: ClimateLearn
tools.one_line_profile: Library for accessing climate data and benchmarking ML models
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to streamline the process of accessing climate datasets and benchmarking machine learning models for weather and climate tasks. It provides standard baselines and data loaders.

tools.name: SentinelDataDownloaderTool
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Sentinel satellite data downloader for AI datasets
tools.detailed_description: A set of scripts utilizing the Google Earth Engine Python API to automate the creation of datasets from Sentinel satellite imagery, facilitating the preparation of Earth Observation data for AI applications.

tools.name: AiTLAS Arena
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark framework for Earth Observation image classification
tools.detailed_description: An open-source benchmark framework for evaluating state-of-the-art deep learning approaches for image classification tasks in Earth Observation (EO). It enables standardized comparison of models on EO datasets.

tools.name: OpenSTL
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive benchmark and library for spatio-temporal predictive learning
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmark and library for spatio-temporal predictive learning, providing various state-of-the-art models and datasets widely used in meteorology and environmental forecasting.

tools.name: py-openaq
tools.one_line_profile: Python wrapper for accessing OpenAQ air quality data
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides a wrapper for the OpenAQ API, facilitating the retrieval and integration of global air quality data for environmental research.

tools.name: EarthNet Minicuber
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for creating EarthNet minicubes for vegetation forecasting
tools.detailed_description: Official utility tool for the EarthNet challenge to create and process 'minicubes' (spatio-temporal data cubes) used in geospatial vegetation forecasting benchmarks.

tools.name: EarthNet Models PyTorch
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning models for EarthNet vegetation forecasting benchmark
tools.detailed_description: A collection of PyTorch implementations of deep neural networks specifically designed for the EarthNet geospatial vegetation forecasting challenge.

tools.name: luftdatenpumpe
tools.one_line_profile: Air quality data acquisition and processing pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A tool to acquire, filter, process, and visualize live and historical air quality data from various sources like Sensor.Community and OpenAQ, supporting time-series storage.

tools.name: WeatherBench 2
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for next-generation data-driven global weather models
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmark suite for evaluating data-driven global weather forecasting models, providing standardized datasets, metrics, and baselines.

tools.name: WeatherBenchX
tools.one_line_profile: Modular framework for evaluating weather forecasts
tools.detailed_description: A modular framework designed to evaluate weather forecasts, extending WeatherBench with additional capabilities for model comparison and metric calculation.

tools.name: StationBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking weather forecasts against station observations
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for benchmarking weather forecast models specifically against ground station observations, providing tools for data alignment and metric computation.

tools.name: airPy
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for generating AI-ready air quality datasets from Earth Engine
tools.detailed_description: A Python package to generate AI-ready datasets for air quality and Earth Observation studies by interfacing with Google Earth Engine.

tools.name: WeatherReal-Benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation pipelines for weather forecast verification
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite providing evaluation pipelines and components to support the WeatherReal dataset, designed for verifying and benchmarking weather forecasting models against real-world data.

tools.name: WILDS
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark of in-the-wild distribution shifts for machine learning
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark package for evaluating machine learning models on distribution shifts, including datasets and metrics for environmental and ecological tasks (e.g., iWildCam for animal monitoring, PovertyMap for satellite imagery analysis).

tools.name: WeatherBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark dataset and baseline models for data-driven weather forecasting
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite for evaluating data-driven weather forecasting models, providing pre-processed datasets (ERA5), evaluation metrics, and baseline model implementations.

tools.name: WEATHER-5K
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale benchmark for global station weather forecasting
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite and dataset for next-generation global station weather forecasting, including time-series data and evaluation protocols.

tools.name: So2Sat-LCZ42
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark dataset for global Local Climate Zones (LCZ) classification
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark dataset consisting of Sentinel-1 and Sentinel-2 satellite imagery for the classification of Local Climate Zones (LCZ). It supports research in urban climate modeling and remote sensing by providing labeled data for training and evaluating machine learning models.
